author: Football Italia Staff
description: Francesco Totti today confirmed that Sunday’s match with Genoa will be his last ever game for Roma.
title: Since Francesco Totti joined Roma…

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Claudio Ranieri warns fans that Francesco Totti’s final match this Sunday is historic, but “Roma comes first, then Francesco.”
title: Ranieri: 'Roma first, then Totti'

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Claudio Ranieri warns fans that Francesco Totti’s final match this Sunday is historic, but “Roma comes first, then Francesco.”
title: Ranieri: 'Roma first, then Totti'

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Fabio Quagliarella believes Roma captain Francesco Totti “does not deserve to be treated like this”.
title: Quagliarella: ‘Totti deserves better’

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Former Roma Coach Luis Enrique declares Francesco Totti is “a legend for all the world”.
title: Luis Enrique: ‘Totti a world legend’

author: FourFourTwo
description: Roma legend Francesco Totti is keen to stay active in the football world, but will not feature on the field for the club after Sunday.
title: Totti confirms Genoa will be his final Roma game

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Former Fiorentina midfielder Dunga laments Francesco Totti’s retirement, but praises his “wonderful career”.
title: Dunga: ‘Totti emotions remain’

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Vincenzo Iaquinta describes Roma captain Francesco Totti as “the best player I played with”.
title: Iaquinta: ‘Totti my best teammate’

author: Football Italia Staff
description: A professor from the University of Genoa has written a lengthy poem in Latin to celebrate the career of Roma legend Francesco Totti.
title: Professor dedicates poem to Totti

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Former Fiorentina midfielder Dunga laments Francesco Totti’s retirement, but praises his “wonderful career”.
title: Dunga: ‘Totti emotions remain’
